body:
Fixes https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/13961

Apply strict constraint checks for patches, otherwise Spack may incorrectly treat a version range constraint as satisfied when mixing x.y and x.y.z versions.

See also: https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/8957#issuecomment-560613454
title: Patching: do strict version range checking
